column5:
Same in here living in an indian family .my parents don't even care about who i really am .does any one know how much depressed i am  right eveyday i think of commiting suicide . 
Always blame me for everything.do any one believe me i never had a pocket money well seeing at classmates parents makes me feel awkward in my mind i think i wish i had a parents like that so loving .atleast they can understand me or stop comparing me with others . my bro is looking for a job as soon as he gets he will leave us and marry his girlfriend. My dad is ready to leave me too .being a girl that to in an indian family is too ashamed
